import React from 'react' import { shape, string, func } from 'prop-types' import { STATUS, PRIORITY } from '../../utils/constants' import { createDropDown } from '../../utils/utils' const namespace = 'taskdata' const TaskData = ({ data: { id, title, priority, status, description }, onChangePriority, onChangeStatus, }) => { return (

Prioridad:

{description}

) } TaskData.propTypes = { data: shape({ title: string.isRequired, priority: string.isRequired, status: string.isRequired, description: string.isRequired }).isRequired, onChangePriority: func.isRequired, onChangeStatus: func.isRequired, } export default TaskData
